avaru khandita antima ghaligeya ondu sucaneyagiddare. Nivu a kuritu sansayisabedi mattu nannannu anusarisiri. Iduve neramargavagide
saitananu nim'mannu (satyadinda) tadeyadirali. Avanu nim'ma spasta satruvagiddane

isa, spasta puravegalondige bandu helidaru; nanu nim'ma balige yuktiyannu tandiruvenu hagu nivu paraspara bhinnate taliruva visayagala vastavavannu nimage vivarisalikkagi (bandiruvenu). Nivu allahanige anjiri hagu nanna adesavannu palisiri
allahanu khandita nanna odeyanu haudu, nim'ma odeyanu haudu. Nivu avananne pujisiri. Aduve nera marga
a balika vividha gumpugalu paraspara bhinnabhipraya talidavu. Akramigalige, ondu kathina dinada sikseya mulaka vinasavide
avaru kayuttiruvudu antima ghaligeyanne tane? Adu, avarige arive illada sthitiyalli hathattane avara mele banderagalide
dharmanisthara horatu itarella mitraru andu paraspara satrugalagi biduvaru
